entities.name: ron

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as being asked by Harry about what she thinks of Malfoy and his father. She introduces her parents to Mr Weasley.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as the one who was seen in Borgin and Burkes with his father. He is selling something.

entities.name: lucius malfoy
entities.description: Lucius Malfoy is mentioned as being worried and selling something in Borgin and Burkes. Mr Weasley wants to get him for something.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr Weasley is mentioned as being sharp and having grim satisfaction when he finds out that Lucius Malfoy is selling something in Borgin and Burkes. He wants to get Lucius for something.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs Weasley is mentioned as being sharp and warning Mr Weasley not to go biting off more than he can chew when dealing with the Malfoy family.

entities.name: borgin and burkes
entities.description: Borgin and Burkes is mentioned as a store where Harry saw Malfoy and his father. It is also where Lucius Malfoy is selling something.
